attributes.action: FAIR CAR INSURANCE FOR YOUNG PEOPLE
attributes.additional_details:
IN THE CURRENT CLIMATE, YOUNG PERSONS ARE BEING QUOTED OVER £12,000 FOR CAR INSURANCE ON THEIR FIRST VECHICLE.

I BELIEVE THIS IS UNFAIR AND UNREALISTIC AND WOULD LIKE TO SEE INSURANCE COMPANIES OFFERING BETTER AND FAIRER PRICES FOR THOSE WHO ARE JUST STARTING OUT ON THE ROADS.

rejection.details: There have been many petitions on this topic, but the matter is one for the insurance industry.
